solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    public char findTheDifference(String s, String t) {--newline--        int n = t.length();--newline--        char c = t.charAt(n - 1);--newline--        for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; ++i) {--newline--            c ^= s.charAt(i);--newline--            c ^= t.charAt(i);--newline--        }--newline--        return c;--newline--    }--newline--}
